<title level="1" pfs="">[Guide](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3472)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Guides bring travelers, tourists, and adventurers into the wondrous natural world, using their expertise to avoid deadly monsters and gruesome hazards.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Guide.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Guide](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3472)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 55

**Perception** +14

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +12, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43) +8, [Scouting Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +10, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +2

**Int** +1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Composite Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75) (40 arrows), [Greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21), [Scale Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=8)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +11 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 60

</row>

**Guide's Warning** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The guide is about to roll a Perception or [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49) check to determine their initiative; **Effect** The guide visually or audibly warns allies, granting them a +1 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls. This bonus increases to +2 if the guide was [Scouting](/Actions.aspx?ID=2629). Depending on how the guide warns allies, this action has the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=541) or [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=727) trait.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
greataxe +12 ([Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d12+8 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+8 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite shortbow +9 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 piercing

**Guiding Words** <actions string="Single Action" />  The guide points out a weakness of a creature within 30 feet. Until the start of the guide's next turn, the guide and all allies that can hear the guiding words gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls against that creature, and the guide's Strikes deal an extra 1d4 precision damage to that creature.

</column>

name: Guide
